entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI: Xamarin.Android.Aapt2.targets(156,3): error : The file exists #16513
  • Expose the platform window creation on WinUI and Catalyst so users can subclass #16512
  • Port Forms Animation/Power Save test #16511
  • Preferences.Get(string key, bool defaultValue) fails on Android #16509
  • Border stroke thickness isn't correct/offset on WinUI #16507
    Backlog
  • [UITest] Fix naming of test file on CI so we don't overwrite the files on attempts #16506
    Backlog
  • [UITests] Fix naming of UITests so we get more information than '_IsEnabled` etc... #16505
    Backlog
  • ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync() does not work on Mac #16502
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0] `.xaml.cs` file nesting doesn't work on first build #16501
    .NET 8 GA
  • Cookies loaded from a file are not sent via HttpClientHandler #16500
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.2.7871] Crash when using NavigationPage.TitleView (Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: The specified child already has a parent) #16499
    .NET 8 GA
  • ImeOptions only working after hot reload - Android #16497
  • Error thrown when accessing resource values with OnPlatform from Resource Dictionary #16494
  • SecureStorage exception on Android device #16493
  • [regression/8.0.100-preview.7.23376.3] [MAUI] RefreshView C1 details page loading was missing #16492
    .NET 8 GA
  • AutomationProperties not working in release mode #16491

Closed

  • FlyoutItem text disappears in Release mode, but not in Debug mode #16490
  • Unable to open properties page of a .net maui project #16496
  • Incorrect use of nullable enable in iOS HealthKit #16503
  • Cookies are not sent in .NET MAUI Blazor with ASP.NET MVC API #16409
  • MapHandler not found exception when using build in Map-feature #12088
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [build] allow main to be built with a .NET 8 SDK #16508
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16489
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [testing] Make test by default on 16.4 #16479
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Allow * rows/columns treated as Auto to expand during 2nd measure pass #16488
    area/layout 🔲, backport/suggested
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Add `dotnet-local` scripts to make using in tree dotnet easier. #16461
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Adds a null check to avoid crashing SearchHandler #16308
    community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [SourceGen] Support genric types from XML namespaces #16486
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Implement Additional PointerGestureRecognizer Platform Arguments #16426
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Added Device ID to Essentials.DeviceInfo #16290
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Consolidate all the testing things #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Setting binding on Label doesn't set text to incoming binding #16410
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Locate MAUI VIew for PlatformView #16463
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [WinUI] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16213
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #16474
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8
